params.defense: Hellbent *(You can't die at night. Whenever you're visited at night, you take 1 damage. Once you take 5 damage, you die.)*

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Roleblock a player each night.
- Attack a player and roleblock a player each night. You may only use this ability if you've taken 1 or more damage.

fields.value: - Whenever you take damage, you'll know whose visit caused you to take that damage and get a generic description of what they did (e.g. investigate, attack, protect, etc.)
